article_title: Two Israeli soldiers injured after Jordan border incident, IDF says.
sentence: The  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  has  given  an  update  on  the  incident  where  they  killed  two  gunmen  who  crossed  into  the  country  from  Jordan.

article_title: Two Israeli soldiers injured after Jordan border incident, IDF says.
sentence: In  the  most  recent  update,  the  IDF  says  the  two  fighters  "crossed  a  few  metres  over  the  border"  and  opened  fire  before  they  were  killed  by  Israeli  gunfire.
